description:
Make progress over technical winter routes feel like a dream. The X-Dream Ice Tool's adjustable handle angle can be changed by 5 degrees for a natural swing in ice or for better pulling and torqueing on rock. There's plenty of shaft clearance thanks to the generous curve, providing precision and balance in finicky placements. The micro-adjustable trigger ledges and generously sized pommels on the shaft allow you swift, smooth matching, regardless of your hand size.

  • Hot-forged aluminum shaft with a gold-resistant polymer overlay
  • Adjustable handle can be moved between 100-105 degrees
  • Modular head allows you to change pick or add a hammer or adze when necessary (sold separately)
  • Includes Mixte pick. Compatible with Ice and Total Dry picks (sold separately)
  • X-Trigger pommel provides a 3rd hand position
  • X-Rest insert reduces handle length by 5mm to accommodate smaller hand sizes
name: Camp X-Dream Ice Tool - Unisex
